name: synthwave-liquid-glass
description: A liquid glass synthwave theme for VS Code. Blending synthwave neon and Monokai colors with a liquid glass effect.
author: Sam Kumar

commands.title: Synthwave Liquid Glass: Clean Up Workbench HTML

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.pretest: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.feature:patch: npm run package && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" && git push origin $(git branch --show-current) && gh pr create --base master --fill
scripts.feature:minor: npm run package && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" && git push origin $(git branch --show-current) && gh pr create --base master --fill
scripts.feature:major: npm run package && npm version major --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" && git push origin $(git branch --show-current) && gh pr create --base master --fill
